<h3 id="X34036">X(34036)&nbsp;=&nbsp; PERSPECTOR OF THESE TRIANGLES:  TT(X(6),X(7)) AND INCIRCLE-INVERSE OF ABC</h3>
Barycentrics &nbsp;&nbsp; a*(a + b - c)*(a - b + c)*(a^3 - a^2*b + a*b^2 - b^3 - a^2*c + b^2*c + a*c^2 + b*c^2 - c^3) : :
<p>
